com.wealdtech.hawk

Class HawkClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wealdtech.hawk.HawkClientConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.wealdtech.configuration.Configuration, java.lang.Comparable<HawkClientConfiguration>

    public class HawkClientConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.wealdtech.configuration.Configuration, java.lang.Comparable<HawkClientConfiguration>
    Configuration for a Hawk client. The Hawk client has a number of configuration parameters. These are as follows:
    • pathPrefix: the path prefix for which the client should add authentication. Defaults to null for everything
    • payloadValidation: if payload validation should take place. Defaults to NEVER
    This is configured as a standard Jackson object and can be realized as part of a ConfigurationSource.
